items.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su Says Sourcing AI Chips From TSMC’s U.S. Plants Is 20% More Expensive, Highlighting the Complications of Building Supply Chains in America
items.summary: AMD CEO Lisa Su highlights the increased cost of sourcing AI chips from TSMC's U.S. plants, showcasing the challenges of building supply chains in America. Despite the high cost, big tech companies have no other choice but to get chips from TSMC's U.S. operations for now.
